plot: After the passing of a comet, a handful of mental patients escape into the woods where unsuspecting folks soon become their victims.
plot_en: After the passing of a comet, a handful of mental patients escape into the woods where unsuspecting folks soon become their victims.
plot_es: After the passing of a comet, a handful of mental patients escape into the woods where unsuspecting folks soon become their victims.
title: Loonies
